document_data.name: Oka Yoshinaka
document_data.mainbody: '''Oka Yoshinaka''' was a retainer of the [[Goshukara clan]] in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1357 DR, Yoshinaka and [[Mashida Kowa]] clashed with the Gamo brothers, [[Gamo Hidenobu|Hidenobu]], [[Gamo Mitsutoshi|Mitsutoshi]] and [[Gamo Mochikuni|Mochikuni]].
document_data.Personality:
Yoshinaka was a very handsome but modest young man. Thank to the influence of his brother, [[Oka Sanai]], he inherited his sound wisdom and showed great promise as a warrior-scholar.

Yoshinaka valued and cared for his appearance (knowing it to be a great asset) but he did not let it get the better of him.
